Objects.Name: barrel beer
Objects.Description: A beer barrel has been left here.

Objects.Name: bottle beer
Objects.Description: A beer bottle has been left here.

Objects.Name: bottle dark ale
Objects.Description: A dark bottle of ale has been left here.

Objects.Name: bottle firebreather
Objects.Description: A bottle of firebreather has been left here.

Objects.Name: bottle local
Objects.Description: A dark bottle has been left here.

Objects.Name: key dull metal
Objects.Description: A key made of a dull metal is lying on the ground here.

Objects.Name: teleporter
Objects.Description: A strange device labeled "teleporter" was left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This teleporter is used to transfer players between zones.  Accessible zonesare listed under HELP ZONES by being CAPITALIZED.  For example to teleport to:  74 Newbie GRAVEyard                   -- Jojen                       3- 5type: teleport grave   The teleporter may also be used to recall back to Midgaard at any time.Uncapitalized zones are linked through a capitalized zone.

Objects.Name: waybread bread
Objects.Description: Some waybread has been put here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The waybread is the traditional feed of elves when travelling, they call itlembas.  It is said to refresh the weary traveler greatly.

Objects.Name: bread loaf
Objects.Description: A loaf of bread has been left here.

Objects.Name: danish pastry
Objects.Description: A nice looking delicious danish pastry has been placed here.

Objects.Name: taco mexican
Objects.Description: A tasty looking Mexican taco has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: burrito hot
Objects.Description: A spicy looking burrito has been set here.

Objects.Name: nachos nacho
Objects.Description: Some nachos have been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They have cheese on them.  Looks like one of Uncle Juan's specials.

Objects.Name: meat chunk
Objects.Description: A rather dubious looking piece of meat is on the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It isn't so much that the meat looks poisoned or anything, but that you justare not sure of its origins.  You doubt that a hunter would drop a side ofvenison or rabbit meat...  What in the world could this meat have come from, youwonder...

Objects.Name: dagger
Objects.Description: A dagger with a long thin blade is here.

Objects.Name: sword small
Objects.Description: A small sword lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The small sword seems to have an inscription of some sort.

Objects.Name: sword long
Objects.Description: A long sword has been left here.

Objects.Name: club wooden
Objects.Description: A simple looking wooden club is here.

Objects.Name: warhammer hammer
Objects.Description: A medium sized warhammer is here.

Objects.Name: flail large
Objects.Description: A large flail is here.

Objects.Name: torch
Objects.Description: A large torch.

Objects.Name: lantern brass
Objects.Description: A brass lantern is here.

Objects.Name: bag
Objects.Description: A small bag is here.

Objects.Name: box
Objects.Description: A small box is here.

Objects.Name: atm teller banks machine
Objects.Description: An automatic teller machine has been installed in the wall here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: There is a small note on the machine which says:To use, type 'BALANCE', 'WITHDRAW <amount>', or 'DEPOSIT <amount>'.Please report any strange occurrences to the bank manager.

Objects.Name: fountain water
Objects.Description: A large fountain carved from blue-streaked marble is here, bubbling merrily.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is a well crafted fountain, carved from a single piece of very beautifulwhite marble shot through with electric blue streaks that look almost likelightning dancing along the sides of the fountain.  It seems to be enchanted insome manner, as the water level seems to never lower.

Objects.Name: cashcard card atm banks
Objects.Description: A handy dandy cashcard is sitting on the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: There is some writing on the back of the card which reads:To use, type 'BALANCE', 'WITHDRAW <amount>', or 'DEPOSIT <amount>'.Please report any strange occurrences to the bank manager.

Objects.Name: candle
Objects.Description: A candle lies here, unlit.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A home-made candle, how quaint!

Objects.Name: nail
Objects.Description: A penny nail lies in the dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Its a common iron nail, used for carpentry work.

Objects.Name: pot
Objects.Description: A cast-iron pot sits on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is a nice pot.  You could use it, if you ever settled down.

Objects.Name: plate breast
Objects.Description: A breast plate is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: shirt chain mail
Objects.Description: A chain mail shirt is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: shield wooden
Objects.Description: A small wooden shield is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: jacket soft leather
Objects.Description: A soft leather jacket is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: jacket studded leather
Objects.Description: A studded leather jacket is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: jacket scale mail
Objects.Description: A scale mail jacket is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: plate bronze breast
Objects.Description: A bronze breast plate is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: scroll identify
Objects.Description: A scroll has carelessly been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The scroll has a magic formula drawn upon it:     ???    ?   ?       ?      ?      ?      *

Objects.Name: potion yellow
Objects.ShortDescription: a yellow potion of see invisible
Objects.Description: A small yellow potion has carelessly been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The potion has a small label 'Detect The Invisible'.

Objects.Name: scroll recall
Objects.Description: A scroll has carelessly been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The scroll has written a formulae of 'Word of Recall' upon it.

Objects.Name: wand gray
Objects.Description: A gray wand has carelessly been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The wand is an old dark gray stick.  You notice a small symbol etchedat the base of the wand.  It looks like this:     \ /    - O -     / \

Objects.Name: staff gnarled
Objects.Description: A gnarled staff has carelessly been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The staff is made of old oak, and is around five feet long. It fitsperfectly into your hand. You notice a small symbol etched at thebase of the staff, it looks like:  ZZZZZ     Z    Z   Z  ZZZZZ  z   z

Objects.Name: staff metal
Objects.Description: A metal staff has carelessly been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The staff is made of metals unknown to you.

Objects.Name: raft
Objects.Description: A raft has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The raft looks very primitive.

Objects.Name: canoe
Objects.Description: A canoe has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The canoe is fairly light.

Objects.Name: gauntlets bronze
Objects.Description: A pair of bronze gauntlets is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: gloves leather
Objects.Description: A pair of leather gloves is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: helmet bronze
Objects.Description: A bronze helmet is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: cap leather
Objects.Description: A leather cap is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: leggings bronze
Objects.Description: A pair of bronze leggings is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: pants leather
Objects.Description: A pair of leather pants is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: leather gorget neck guard
Objects.Description: A leather neck guard has been left here
Objects.ExtraDescription: This leather neck guard is meant to protect the throat and face in battle.

Objects.Name: leather ring
Objects.Description: A leather ring with strange symbols lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The ring used to have some strange writing and symbols around the band but ithas become so worn with time and use that it is unreadable.

Objects.Name: leather boots
Objects.Description: A pair of leather boots is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The boots are worn with age but well oiled and polished to still remainuseable.

Objects.Name: sleeves bronze
Objects.Description: A pair of bronze sleeves is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: sleeves leather
Objects.Description: A pair of leather sleeves is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: brown leather cape
Objects.Description: A brown leather cape was abandoned on the floor
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is a rough brown leather cape that is frayed at the end.

Objects.Name: leather old belt
Objects.Description: A belt made of leather was left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks very, very old.

Objects.Name: leather wristguard
Objects.Description: A leather wristguard lies in the dirt.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The wristguard has been heavily oiled and is extremely flexible andsupportive.  It is laced with some leather string to loosen and tighten toalmost any size.

Objects.Name: boards social bulletin gen_boards
Objects.Description: A large, sociable bulletin board is mounted on a wall here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: If you can read this, the board is not working.

Objects.Name: boards frozen bulletin gen_boards
Objects.Description: A large bulletin board is here, carved from a block of ice.
Objects.ExtraDescription: If you can read this, the board is not working.

Objects.Name: boards holy bulletin gen_boards
Objects.Description: A large bulletin board is mounted on a wall here.  It glows with a faint aura.
Objects.ExtraDescription: If you can read this, the board is not working.

Objects.Name: boards bulletin gen_boards
Objects.Description: A large bulletin board is mounted on a wall here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: If you can read this, the board is not working.
